thoughts.text: I will use the 'execute_shell' command to convert the PDF guide to a text file.
thoughts.reasoning: Now that the 'pdfminer' package is installed, I will use the 'execute_shell' command to convert the PDF guide to a text file. This will allow me to extract information about different trees in Michigan from the PDF guide using the 'read_file' command. I will then use the information extracted to write an informative article about the different trees found in Michigan.
thoughts.plan:
- Use 'execute_shell' command to convert the PDF guide to a text file
- Use 'read_file' command to extract information about different trees in Michigan from the text file
- Use the information extracted to write the article
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to properly cite my sources in the article.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'execute_shell' command to convert the PDF guide to a text file.
